snippet.title: Chernobyl Again - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
☢️ Chernobyl Again ☢️ is an adventure game created for Virtual Reality headsets that takes place in the 3D-scanned Chernobyl Exclusion Zone for a more immersive and engaging experience. Take this chance to explore the Zone, experience its dark atmosphere, and follow a story full of unexpected twists and various kinds of puzzles you’ll solve while traveling through space and time.

Website: https://www.chernobylagain.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chernobyl_again
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chernobylagain
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChernobylAgain
Discord: https://discord.gg/rCxmkbsBQ9
